title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: When the default value is modified in the list box of a report parameter, the new default value is not retained. Steps to reproduce: 1. Access the report parameter settings. 2. Modify the default value in the list box. 3. Save the changes. 4. Close and reopen the report parameter settings. 5. Observe that the modified default value is not retained.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The modified default value in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after making the change and saving it.
SR: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Modify the default value in the list box. 3. Save the changes. 4. Close and reopen the report parameter settings. 5. Confirm that the modified default value is retained.
